segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold.

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the growing puddle, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's ruining the floor and cabinets slowly.

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang for what might happen next.

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet scene hides so much vulnerability.
segments.speaker: PAR
